description: Auto-generate ALT attributes for img tags using Gemini API (supports HTML/PHP/JSX/TSX with static paths)
command.generateVideoAriaLabel: Generate ARIA-LABEL or description for videos
config.geminiApiKey.markdownDescription:
Gemini API Key ([Get API key from Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/api-keys))  

**Note:** The API key is stored securely and displayed as dots for security.  
[Clear API Key](command:alt-generator.clearApiKey)
config.geminiApiModel.enum.pro: Most advanced model for complex tasks
config.generationMode.description: [ALT] Set what to prioritize when generating text
config.generationMode.markdownDescriptio: [ALT] Set what to prioritize when generating text.
config.generationMode.enum.seo: SEO: Generate ALT text focused on search engine optimization (SEO)
config.generationMode.enum.a11y: A11Y: Generate ALT text focused on accessibility (A11Y) improvement
config.insertionMode.description: Set how to insert generated text
config.insertionMode.markdownDescription: Set how to insert generated text.
config.insertionMode.enum.confirm: Manual: Review generated text content before manual insertion
config.outputLanguage.description: Set the language of generated text
config.decorativeKeywords.markdownDescri: If the filename contains these keywords, it will be identified as decorative and the ALT will be set to empty (`alt=""`).
config.contextEnabled.description: Analyze information around img and video tags to generate more appropriate text that fits the context
config.contextEnabled.markdownDescriptio:
Analyze information around img and video tags to generate more appropriate text that fits the context. This prevents screen readers from reading the same information twice, improving user experience.  

**Note:** Enabling this feature will increase API usage.
config.contextRange.description: Set the width of text used for context analysis. Wider range improves accuracy
config.contextRange.markdownDescription: Set the width of text used for context analysis. Wider range improves accuracy.
config.contextRange.enum.narrow: Narrow: Only text from very nearby elements. Cost and speed priority.
config.contextRange.enum.standard: Standard: Includes surrounding text to some extent. Balanced priority.
config.contextRange.enum.wide: Wide: Understands detailed context from a wide range of text. Quality priority.
config.videoDescriptionLength.descriptio: [ARIA-LABEL] Set the detail level of generated text. Use detailed mode for creating text manuscripts for audio descriptions, etc
config.videoDescriptionLength.markdownDe: [ARIA-LABEL] Set the detail level of generated text. Use detailed mode for creating text manuscripts for audio descriptions, etc.
config.videoDescriptionLength.enum.stand: Standard: Generate a short aria-label that describes the video's purpose or function.
config.videoDescriptionLength.enum.detai: Detailed: Generate more detailed text including the visual content of the video.
config.customPromptsPath.markdownDescrip:
Path to custom prompts JSON file (relative to workspace root).  

Custom prompts override default prompts. If the file doesn't exist, default prompts are used.  

**Example:** `.vscode/custom-prompts.json`
